description:
Hello and welcome to my course in Creating your Electronic Dance Track using Cubase Pro 8.  

This course is all about helping you create your own dance music track using Cubase 8 Pro.  We will look at using strategies which are very current today in Electronic Dance Music.  It's intended for anyone that has an interest in making music so it's totally fine to have limited experience in using the software!

Throughout the course I will give you tips to use and to help walk you through the process so you can get the most out of the course.  In the section (What to do now that you have your song)  you will also be getting some invaluable knowledge on those critical next steps and also how you can protect yourself to give you the best possible chance of securing a record deal.
title: Create an EDM Track Using Cubase 8 Pro
